description: 粘性布局组件，元素相对于窗口或指定容器的吸顶效果。

descriptionTags.en: Sticky layout component, The sticky-to-top effect of the element relative to the window or specified container
descriptionTags.name: 粘性布局

position.description:
吸附位置，top 表示吸顶，bottom 表示吸底，both 表示既吸顶又吸底
@en Adsorption position, top means fixed top, bottom means fixed bottom, both means both top and bottom
position.name: position

tags.en: Adsorption position, top means fixed top, bottom means fixed bottom, both means both top and bottom

position.descWithTags: 吸附位置，top 表示吸顶，bottom 表示吸底，both 表示既吸顶又吸底

topOffset.description:
当距离容器顶部距离为该值时吸顶
@en Fixed top when the distance from the top of the container is this value
topOffset.name: topOffset

tags.en: Fixed top when the distance from the top of the container is this value

topOffset.descWithTags: 当距离容器顶部距离为该值时吸顶

bottomOffset.description:
当距离容器底部距离为该值时吸底
@en Fixed bottom when the distance from the bottom of the container is this value
bottomOffset.name: bottomOffset

tags.en: Fixed bottom when the distance from the bottom of the container is this value

bottomOffset.descWithTags: 当距离容器底部距离为该值时吸底

followOffset.description:
当sticky元素需要跟随依附容器离开视口时距离依附容器边缘的距离
@en The distance from the edge of the attached container when the sticky element needs to follow the attached container to leave the viewport
followOffset.name: followOffset

tags.en: The distance from the edge of the attached container when the sticky element needs to follow the attached container to leave the viewport

followOffset.descWithTags: 当sticky元素需要跟随依附容器离开视口时距离依附容器边缘的距离

tags.en: Custom classname
Custom stylesheet

children.description:
组件内部内容
@en Children elements of the component
children.name: children

tags.en: Children elements of the component
z-index

portalWhenSticky.description:
在处于sticky状态时是否portal
@en Whether it is portal in sticky state
portalWhenSticky.name: portalWhenSticky

tags.en: Whether it is portal in sticky state

stickyStyle.description:
处于sticky状态时，元素固定样式。推荐用fixed，如果为absolute则需自行为滚动容器的父容器设置 position: relative
@en When in the sticky state, the fixed style of the element. Fixed is recommended. If absolute, need to set position: relative for the parent container of the scrolling container.
stickyStyle.name: stickyStyle

tags.en: When in the sticky state, the fixed style of the element. Fixed is recommended. If absolute, need to set position: relative for the parent container of the scrolling container.

stickyStyle.descWithTags: 处于sticky状态时，元素固定样式。推荐用fixed，如果为absolute则需自行为滚动容器的父容器设置 position: relative

stickyCssStyle.description:
处于sticky状态时的自定义样式
@en Custom style when in sticky state
stickyCssStyle.name: stickyCssStyle

tags.en: Custom style when in sticky state

stickyCssStyle.descWithTags: 处于sticky状态时的自定义样式

getPortalContainer.description:
被portal时挂载的容器
@en Container mounted when being portaled
getPortalContainer.name: getPortalContainer

tags.en: Container mounted when being portaled

onStickyStateChange.name: onStickyStateChange

tags.en:
Triggered when the sticky state is switched
isSticky: Whether it is currently in the top/bottom state
Whether the previous state is the top/bottom state

onStickyStateChange.descWithTags:
吸顶状态切换时触发
payload.isSticky: 当前是否为吸顶/吸底状态
payload.wasSticky: 前一个状态是否为吸顶/吸底状态

onTopChange.description:
滚动时top变化回调，参数为元素距离容器顶部减去topOffset的距离
@en The top change callback when scrolling, the parameter is the distance of the element from the top of the container minus topOffset
onTopChange.name: onTopChange

tags.en: The top change callback when scrolling, the parameter is the distance of the element from the top of the container minus topOffset

onTopChange.descWithTags: 滚动时top变化回调，参数为元素距离容器顶部减去topOffset的距离

getContainer.name: getContainer

tags.en:
Specifies the attachment container of the sticky element. The sticky element will not exceed the container and will follow when the container leaves the viewport
If a string is returned, use querySelector to select the container

getContainer.descWithTags:
指定sticky元素的依附容器，sticky元素不会超出容器，在容器离开视口时会跟随
如果返回string则使用querySelector选取容器

getScrollContainer.description:
指定滚动容器；如果返回string则使用querySelector选取容器
@en Specifies the scrolling container. If this value is specified, the relative property is always regarded as false; if a string is input, use querySelector to select the container
getScrollContainer.name: getScrollContainer

tags.en: Specifies the scrolling container. If this value is specified, the relative property is always regarded as false; if a string is input, use querySelector to select the container

getScrollContainer.descWithTags: 指定滚动容器；如果返回string则使用querySelector选取容器

isSticky.name: isSticky
isSticky.description:
当前是否为吸顶/吸底状态
@en Whether it is currently in the top/bottom suction state

tags.en: Whether it is currently in the top/bottom suction state

isSticky.descWithTags: 当前是否为吸顶/吸底状态

wasSticky.name: wasSticky
wasSticky.description:
前一个状态是否为吸顶/吸底状态
@en Whether the previous state is ceiling / bottom suction state

tags.en: Whether the previous state is ceiling / bottom suction state

wasSticky.descWithTags: 前一个状态是否为吸顶/吸底状态

dom.name: dom
dom.description:
最外层元素 DOM
@en The outermost element DOM

tags.en: The outermost element DOM

recalculatePosition.name: recalculatePosition
recalculatePosition.description:
局部滚动模式下，如果容器外部还有嵌套滚动，可主动调用此方法，让 sticky 的元素主动更新 fixed 位置
@en In the local scrolling mode, if there is nested scrolling outside the container, this method can be actively called to make the sticky element actively update the fixed position

tags.en: In the local scrolling mode, if there is nested scrolling outside the container, this method can be actively called to make the sticky element actively update the fixed position

recalculatePosition.descWithTags: 局部滚动模式下，如果容器外部还有嵌套滚动，可主动调用此方法，让 sticky 的元素主动更新 fixed 位置

updatePlaceholderLayout.name: updatePlaceholderLayout
updatePlaceholderLayout.description:
手动更新占位模块的高度
@en Manually update the height of the placeholder

tags.en: Manually update the height of the placeholder

updatePlaceholderLayout.descWithTags: 手动更新占位模块的高度
